setStreamReplicationFactor((bytes32,addr.details: Only callable by configuration managersThis function is to migrate existing non-replicated streams to replicated streams. If the replication factor is less than the number of nodes it indicates that only the first "replicationFactor" nodes participate in reaching quorum. The remaining nodes only sync the stream data.

params.requests: list with streams to set replication factor for

params.stop: The ending index for pagination, exclusive
